innoviz-technologies.name: Omer Keilaf
innoviz-technologies.bio: Co-founded Innoviz Technologies in 2016 and leads the company's development of high-performance LiDAR sensors for autonomous vehicles.

innoviz-technologies.name: Oren Rosenzweig
innoviz-technologies.bio: Co-founded Innoviz and oversees the technical development of the company's solid-state LiDAR technology.

innoviz-technologies.name: Oren Buskila
innoviz-technologies.bio: Co-founded Innoviz Technologies and leads research and development efforts for the company's sensing solutions.

keren-kayemeth-leisrael-jewish-national-.name: Avraham Duvdevani
keren-kayemeth-leisrael-jewish-national-.bio: Served as chairman of Keren Kayemeth LeIsrael–Jewish National Fund, overseeing Israel's largest green organization focused on land development and afforestation.

keren-kayemeth-leisrael-jewish-national-.name: Ronald Lauder
keren-kayemeth-leisrael-jewish-national-.bio: Businessman and philanthropist who served as World Chairman of JNF and is known for his extensive involvement in Jewish and Zionist causes.

keren-kayemeth-leisrael-jewish-national-.name: Daniel Atar
keren-kayemeth-leisrael-jewish-national-.bio: Israeli politician and former chairman of KKL-JNF who led major land development and environmental projects across Israel.

keren-kayemeth-leisrael-jewish-national-.name: Ifat Ovadia-Luski
keren-kayemeth-leisrael-jewish-national-.bio: Served as Director General of KKL-JNF managing the organization's nationwide forestation, water, and community development programs.

ree-automotive.name: Daniel Barel
ree-automotive.bio: Co-founded REE Automotive and leads the company's mission to reinvent electric vehicle platforms with its REEcorner technology.

ree-automotive.name: Ahishay Sardes
ree-automotive.bio: Co-founded REE Automotive and drives the technical vision behind the company's modular EV platform architecture.

ree-automotive.name: Josh Tech
ree-automotive.bio: Serves as Chief Financial Officer of REE Automotive overseeing financial strategy through the company's public listing and growth phase.

israel-innovation-authority.name: Dror Bin
israel-innovation-authority.bio: Leads the Israel Innovation Authority as CEO, directing Israel's national policy on technological innovation and R&D funding.

israel-innovation-authority.name: Ami Appelbaum
israel-innovation-authority.bio: Serves as Chairman of the Israel Innovation Authority's board and is a veteran of the Israeli high-tech industry.

israel-innovation-authority.name: Anya Eldan
israel-innovation-authority.bio: Heads the Startup Division of the Israel Innovation Authority, supporting early-stage technology companies with funding and mentorship.

channel-12-keshet.name: Avi Nir
channel-12-keshet.bio: Longtime CEO of Keshet Media Group, the company behind Channel 12, leading it to become Israel's most-watched commercial television network.

channel-12-keshet.name: Alon Shtruzman
channel-12-keshet.bio: Heads Keshet International, the global distribution and production arm responsible for exporting Israeli TV formats worldwide.

channel-12-keshet.name: Yonatan Stern
channel-12-keshet.bio: Leads Channel 12's news division, overseeing one of Israel's flagship nightly news broadcasts and current affairs programming.

orcam-technologies.name: Amnon Shashua
orcam-technologies.bio: World-renowned computer vision expert who co-founded OrCam Technologies and also co-founded Mobileye, revolutionizing AI-powered assistive devices.

orcam-technologies.name: Ziv Aviram
orcam-technologies.bio: Co-founded OrCam Technologies alongside Amnon Shashua and leads the company's development of wearable AI devices for the visually impaired.

orcam-technologies.name: Nachum Sharvit
orcam-technologies.bio: Oversees research and development at OrCam, driving the AI and computer vision algorithms behind the OrCam MyEye product line.

walkme.name: Dan Adika
walkme.bio: Co-founded WalkMe in 2011 and led the digital adoption platform to a successful IPO on the Nasdaq in 2021.

walkme.name: Rafael Sweary
walkme.bio: Co-founded WalkMe and serves as President, guiding the company's go-to-market strategy and global business development.

walkme.name: Eyal Cohen
walkme.bio: Co-founded WalkMe and leads the technology organization building the platform's digital adoption solutions.

taro-pharmaceutical-israel.name: Uday Baldota
taro-pharmaceutical-israel.bio: Serves as CEO of Taro Pharmaceutical Industries, a subsidiary of Sun Pharmaceutical Industries, overseeing global pharmaceutical operations.

taro-pharmaceutical-israel.name: Barrie Levitt
taro-pharmaceutical-israel.bio: Founded and led Taro Pharmaceutical Industries for decades, building it into a leading specialty pharmaceutical company.

taro-pharmaceutical-israel.name: Dilip Shanghvi
taro-pharmaceutical-israel.bio: Founder and chairman of Sun Pharmaceutical Industries, which acquired majority ownership of Taro Pharmaceutical in 2010.

candiru-saito-tech.name: Eitan Achlow
candiru-saito-tech.bio: Co-founded Candiru (Saito Tech) and leads the secretive Israeli cybersecurity firm specializing in offensive cyber tools and spyware.

candiru-saito-tech.name: Yaakov Weizman
candiru-saito-tech.bio: Co-founded Candiru, bringing expertise from Israeli intelligence to develop advanced cyber exploitation capabilities.

candiru-saito-tech.name: Isaac Zack
candiru-saito-tech.bio: Prominent Israeli venture capitalist and early backer of Candiru, also known for his investments in NSO Group and other cyber firms.

ide-technologies.name: Avraham Tenne
ide-technologies.bio: Led IDE Technologies as CEO, overseeing the development of some of the world's largest and most advanced seawater desalination plants.

ide-technologies.name: Miriam Faigon
ide-technologies.bio: Serves as CEO of IDE Technologies, leading the global water treatment company in delivering desalination and water purification solutions.

ide-technologies.name: Barak Hertz
ide-technologies.bio: Chief Technology Officer at IDE Technologies responsible for advancing the company's proprietary desalination and water treatment technologies.

university-of-haifa.name: Ron Robin
university-of-haifa.bio: Serves as President of the University of Haifa, a historian who leads Israel's most diverse and pluralistic research university.

university-of-haifa.name: Gustavo Mesch
university-of-haifa.bio: Sociologist and former Rector of the University of Haifa known for his research on internet and society.

university-of-haifa.name: David Faraggi
university-of-haifa.bio: Biostatistician who served as Rector of the University of Haifa, advancing the university's academic and research programs.

weizmann-institute-of-science.name: Alon Chen
weizmann-institute-of-science.bio: Neuroscientist serving as President of the Weizmann Institute of Science, one of the world's leading multidisciplinary research institutions.

weizmann-institute-of-science.name: Chaim Weizmann
weizmann-institute-of-science.bio: Renowned chemist and first President of Israel who founded the Weizmann Institute (originally the Sieff Institute) in 1934 in Rehovot.

weizmann-institute-of-science.name: Daniel Zajfman
weizmann-institute-of-science.bio: Physicist who served as President of the Weizmann Institute from 2006 to 2019, expanding its global research collaborations.

weizmann-institute-of-science.name: Michal Neeman
weizmann-institute-of-science.bio: Distinguished biologist serving as Vice President of the Weizmann Institute, known for pioneering MRI-based research in cancer biology.

israel-military-industries-imi-systems.name: Avi Felder
israel-military-industries-imi-systems.bio: Led IMI Systems as CEO during its transition period before its acquisition by Elbit Systems in 2018.

israel-military-industries-imi-systems.name: Bezhalel Machlis
israel-military-industries-imi-systems.bio: CEO of Elbit Systems which acquired IMI Systems, integrating its munitions and defense capabilities into the larger defense conglomerate.

israel-military-industries-imi-systems.name: Oded Danziger
israel-military-industries-imi-systems.bio: Former CEO of IMI who guided the state-owned defense manufacturer through modernization of its weapons and ammunition production lines.

nice-ltd.name: Barak Eilam
nice-ltd.bio: Leads NICE Ltd as CEO, transforming the company into a global leader in cloud and AI-powered enterprise software solutions.

nice-ltd.name: Haim Shani
nice-ltd.bio: Veteran Israeli technology executive serving as Chairman of NICE Ltd's board of directors.

nice-ltd.name: Barry Cooper
nice-ltd.bio: Heads NICE's Customer Experience division, overseeing the CXone cloud contact center platform serving enterprises worldwide.

orbotech-kla.name: Rick Wallace
orbotech-kla.bio: CEO of KLA Corporation which acquired Orbotech in 2019, integrating its electronics inspection technology into KLA's semiconductor portfolio.

orbotech-kla.name: Asher Levy
orbotech-kla.bio: Led Orbotech as CEO before its acquisition by KLA, growing the company into a leader in PCB and display inspection technology.

orbotech-kla.name: Amichai Steimberg
orbotech-kla.bio: Served as COO of Orbotech overseeing operations and playing a key role in the company's technology and business development.

ministry-of-foreign-affairs.name: Gideon Saar
ministry-of-foreign-affairs.bio: Israeli politician serving as Minister of Foreign Affairs, previously held multiple senior government positions including Minister of Justice.

ministry-of-foreign-affairs.name: Alon Ushpiz
ministry-of-foreign-affairs.bio: Career diplomat serving as Director-General of Israel's Ministry of Foreign Affairs, overseeing the country's diplomatic missions worldwide.

ministry-of-foreign-affairs.name: Yair Lapid
ministry-of-foreign-affairs.bio: Israeli politician and journalist who served as Foreign Minister and Prime Minister, founding the Yesh Atid party.

habana-labs-intel.name: David Dahan
habana-labs-intel.bio: Co-founded Habana Labs and served as CEO, leading the AI chip startup to its $2 billion acquisition by Intel in 2019.

habana-labs-intel.name: Ran Halutz
habana-labs-intel.bio: Co-founded Habana Labs and served as CTO, architecting the Gaudi and Goya AI training and inference processors.

habana-labs-intel.name: Avigdor Willenz
habana-labs-intel.bio: Serial entrepreneur who founded Habana Labs, previously founded Galileo Technology and Annapurna Labs, both acquired for billions.

via-transportation.name: Daniel Ramot
via-transportation.bio: Co-founded Via Transportation and leads the company's mission to build technology that transforms public transportation systems worldwide.

via-transportation.name: Oren Shoval
via-transportation.bio: Co-founded Via Transportation and oversees the development of the company's real-time transit optimization algorithms.

via-transportation.name: David Rosenblatt
via-transportation.bio: Technology executive and investor who serves on Via's board, bringing experience from leadership roles at Google and other tech companies.

the-times-of-israel.name: David Horovitz
the-times-of-israel.bio: Founded The Times of Israel in 2012 and serves as its editor, previously serving as editor-in-chief of The Jerusalem Post.

the-times-of-israel.name: Seth Klarman
the-times-of-israel.bio: American billionaire hedge fund manager and philanthropist who provided major funding for the launch of The Times of Israel.

the-times-of-israel.name: Eric Cortellessa
the-times-of-israel.bio: Journalist and senior correspondent at The Times of Israel covering U.S. politics and its intersection with Israeli affairs.

appsflyer.name: Oren Kaniel
appsflyer.bio: Co-founded AppsFlyer in 2011 and leads the company as a global leader in mobile attribution and marketing analytics.

appsflyer.name: Reshef Mann
appsflyer.bio: Co-founded AppsFlyer and serves as CTO, building the technology platform that measures mobile advertising campaigns worldwide.

appsflyer.name: Brian Quinn
appsflyer.bio: Serves as President of AppsFlyer, driving the company's global growth strategy and enterprise partnerships.

fiverr-international.name: Micha Kaufman
fiverr-international.bio: Co-founded Fiverr in 2010 and leads the global online marketplace connecting freelancers with businesses, taking it public on NYSE in 2019.

fiverr-international.name: Shai Wininger
fiverr-international.bio: Co-founded Fiverr International and later went on to co-found Lemonade, an AI-driven insurance technology company.

fiverr-international.name: Ofer Katz
fiverr-international.bio: Serves as Chief Financial Officer of Fiverr International, managing the company's financial operations through its IPO and growth period.

tower-semiconductor.name: Russell Ellwanger
tower-semiconductor.bio: Leads Tower Semiconductor as CEO, growing the specialty foundry into a major global analog semiconductor manufacturer.

tower-semiconductor.name: Oren Shirazi
tower-semiconductor.bio: Serves as CFO and Senior Vice President of Tower Semiconductor overseeing financial strategy and investor relations.

tower-semiconductor.name: Noel Hurley
tower-semiconductor.bio: Chief Operating Officer of Tower Semiconductor managing the company's global fabrication operations across multiple countries.

gett.name: Dave Waiser
gett.bio: Co-founded Gett (originally GetTaxi) and leads the ride-hailing and corporate ground transportation technology company.

gett.name: Roi More
gett.bio: Co-founded Gett and oversees the technology platform powering ride-hailing services across multiple markets.

gett.name: Matt Weinberg
gett.bio: Led Gett's North American operations, focusing on the corporate ground transportation market in major U.S. cities.

teva-pharmaceutical-industries.name: Richard Francis
teva-pharmaceutical-industries.bio: Leads Teva Pharmaceutical Industries as CEO, guiding the world's largest generic drug manufacturer through its strategic turnaround.

teva-pharmaceutical-industries.name: Eli Hurvitz
teva-pharmaceutical-industries.bio: Legendary Israeli industrialist who led Teva for decades, transforming it from a small local company into a global pharmaceutical giant.

teva-pharmaceutical-industries.name: Kåre Schultz
teva-pharmaceutical-industries.bio: Danish pharmaceutical executive who served as Teva's CEO from 2017 to 2023, leading the company's debt restructuring and turnaround efforts.

teva-pharmaceutical-industries.name: Sol Barer
teva-pharmaceutical-industries.bio: Pharmaceutical industry veteran who served as Chairman of Teva's board of directors, previously CEO of Celgene Corporation.

yad-vashem.name: Dani Dayan
yad-vashem.bio: Serves as Chairman of Yad Vashem, Israel's official memorial to victims of the Holocaust, previously served as Consul General in New York.

yad-vashem.name: Avner Shalev
yad-vashem.bio: Led Yad Vashem as Chairman for over two decades, overseeing the creation of the new Holocaust History Museum and major expansion of its archives.

yad-vashem.name: Irina Bokova
yad-vashem.bio: Former UNESCO Director-General who supports Yad Vashem's global education mission on Holocaust remembrance and education.

yad-vashem.name: Benjamin Netanyahu
yad-vashem.bio: As Prime Minister of Israel serves a ceremonial role in Yad Vashem's Honorary Council, frequently participating in Holocaust remembrance ceremonies.
